title: 'I'm drawn to people who have a voice': Coach's Stuart Vevers on teaming up with female boxing champ Ramla Ali
text:
Why Coach's creative director, Stuart Vevers, chose Meghan Markle's favourite boxer, Ramla Ali, as the brand's new ambassador

There was a moment, sloshing through sleet and snow on a New York November morning in 2013, that Stuart Vevers, the newly anointed executive creative director of American luxury behemoth Coach, realised something important about how women dress.

Vevers was walking along the High Line - a former overhead railway that is now an urban garden walkway - and taking in the pace of the women coursing by in practical trainers, sturdy flat boots and tech fabrics. It was a far cry from the princessy Sex and the City stereotype of spindly heels and a touch of couture with your morning...
